projects.name: National Air Quality
projects.description: A project exploring national air quality data to understand pollution levels and environmental factors across different regions.

projects.name: US Healthcare Dataset
projects.description: A project examining US healthcare data to understand how patient demographics, medical conditions, and admission types relate to healthcare costs.

projects.name: India CPI Inflation
projects.description: A project analyzing India's Consumer Price Index to understand inflation trends, sector contributions, and how external factors like COVID-19 and oil prices affect prices.

projects.name: E-com Orders
projects.description: A project creating a Power BI dashboard to visualize e-commerce sales performance, track sales team targets, and understand customer behavior across different regions.

projects.name: Retail Store
projects.description: A project using SQL to analyze retail sales data, understand product performance, customer purchasing patterns, and identify opportunities for better inventory management.

projects.name: E-Com Business
projects.description: A project using SQL to analyze e-commerce operations including customer behavior, product performance, sales trends, and inventory patterns.

projects.name: Covid-19
projects.description: A project analyzing COVID-19 data from over 276 regions to track how the disease spread, recovery rates, and mortality patterns varied across different countries and time periods.

projects.name: PhonePe Digital Payments
projects.description: A project exploring PhonePe digital payment transactions across Indian states and districts to understand payment trends, device usage, and how demographics influence transaction behavior.

projects.name: Loan Default
projects.description: A project analyzing Superstore sales data to understand sales patterns, customer segments, profitability factors, and regional performance differences.

projects.name: Pro Kabaddi League
projects.description: A project analyzing Pro Kabaddi League match data to understand gameplay patterns, player performance metrics, and team strategies.

projects.name: Superstore Sales
projects.description: A project exploring Superstore sales data to understand sales trends, identify customer segments, and analyze what drives profitability across different categories and regions.

projects.name: Credit Risk Modelling
projects.description: A project analyzing client loan data to understand credit behavior patterns, assess risk levels, and identify factors that influence loan approval decisions.
